//: This is a template package.json to begin with.
Copy to your Hugo project root folder and run
name: personal-website

scripts.build: URL=$(if [ -n "$URL" ]; then echo "-b $URL"; fi); hugo version; hugo --gc --minify $URL
scripts.preview: npm run prebuild; DEPLOY_PRIME_URL=$(if [ -n "$DEPLOY_PRIME_URL" ]; then echo "-b $DEPLOY_PRIME_URL"; fi); hugo version; hugo --gc --minify --buildFuture $DEPLOY_PRIME_URL

scriptsComments.serve: Run Hugo in lazy rendering mode during local development.
scriptsComments.develop: Run Hugo in fast rendering mode during local development.
scriptsComments.build: Build Hugo production website with optional URL environment variable.
scriptsComments.preview: Build Hugo preview website with optional DEPLOY_PRIME_URL environment variable.

author: Julian Pawlowski <julian.pawlowski@gmail.com>

dependenciesComments.hugo-bin: This will set the Hugo version to be used. Note that the NPM package version is different from the actual Hugo binary version.
